Corinna Niederreiter is a Program Manager at the **EIT Urban Mobility Doctoral Training Network** and 
Deputy Managing Director of the International Graduate School of Science and Engineering (IGSSE) at 
the **Technical University of Munich**. 
With extensive experience in academic programme coordination and international collaboration, 
she has managed interdisciplinary doctoral training and research initiatives at **TUM** and previously worked 
at **Ludwig-Maximilians-Universität München** in teaching and research roles. 
Corinna holds a Master’s degree in German as a Foreign Language and a Bachelor’s in Finno-Ugric Studies from **LMU Munich**. 
She is passionate about fostering interdisciplinary education, qualitative research, and innovative training 
for future urban mobility leaders.
